duties_responsibilities.duty: Owns management and development of multiple store managers, and thereby the store teams
Sets clear expectations with store managers within the district on goals and provides coaching and feedback to achieve business results

Conducts regular store visits to conduct business analysis ensuring safe environments for our associates and customers, uncovering opportunities in selling behaviors and marketing, and ensuring that brand standards are up to date in each location
Analyzes the business through use of company reporting and develops action plans with each store team to improve results
Embodies our values by encouraging an inclusive environment and delivering effective coaching and performance management
Actively collaborates with cross-functional partners across the business as needed
